title: Close Wealth Management Account
description: A client is transferring their assets to another institution and wants to close their account.

tasks.description: Receive the ACATS transfer request from the other institution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives and validates the Automated Customer Account Transfer Service request.

tasks.description: Liquidate any non-transferable assets as per client instructions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sells a proprietary mutual fund and sweeps the cash.

tasks.description: Transfer all assets and close the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully completes the ACATS transfer, leaving a zero balance, and closes the account.
